messages.speech:
Here are the things you should do in case of an accident/loss due to fire/flood/inundation to your property :

1. Please safeguard the property from further loss
2. Minimize the loss with firefighting operations
3. Separate the sound material from the damaged and shift to a safe location
4. Immediately intimate to the Fire Brigade/Police for help
5. Inform the Insurance Company immediately to reach you
